Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Theophany:

Text.Language: H/ppe afermeyre n~je Iwann/c pibaptict/c: je ai]wmc m~P[oic qen nimwou n~te Piiordan/c.
Behold, John the Baptist testified, “I baptized the Lord in the waters of the Jordan.”
ها قد شهد يوحنا الصابغ اني عمدت الرب في مياه الأردن.
Ouoh aicwtem e~t~c~m/ n~te Viwt ecws e~bol: je vai pe Pas/ri Pamenrit e~tai]ma] n~q/tf.
And I heard the Father’s voice crying out, saying, “This is My Son, My beloved, in whom I am pleased.”
وسمعت صوت الآب صارخا أن هذا هو ابني الحبيب الذي به سررت.
